data.name: Leyline Knights
data.detailed_description:
Leyline Knights is an elemental action roguelike about fighting to reach the top of the Great Tree in search of magic. Wield arcane magic & swift swordsmanship to fight for your ailed sibling.

Wield the Elements

Manipulate elements like fire, lightning, and ice against foes imbued with their own elements. Combine elements to create unique abilities and adapt to the astral constructs of the Great Tree.

Duel the Aetherblood Knights

Standing against you are those born attuned to the elements, the Aetherblood. Face their attempts to stop your climb up the Great Tree and learn about their reasons for fighting for the Leyline.

data.short_description: Leyline Knights is an elemental action roguelike about fighting to reach the top of the Great Tree in search of magic. Wield arcane magic & swift swordsmanship to fight for your ailed sibling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 512 MB video RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 5850)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
